title: Lynda - Up and Running with AngularJS
description: Extend HTML through the rich JavaScript framework AngularJS. Learn how to use scoped controllers to bind data to markup, while keeping your JavaScript decoupled and reusable. Use filters to handle the final visual output of your data, without cluttering the rest of your codebase. Route requests through AngularJS rather than making a round trip to the server. Load and modify server data using custom services. Plus, find tools designed to work with AngularJS and learn about ways you can extend it to suit your needs.
